QuestData.Title: Retreat!
QuestData.Description: I'm going to withdraw what few forces I have. We may have to fall back to the Stormstout Brewery, or even Halfhill. That call is Commander Loon Mai's to make.$b$bYou go ahead. Deliver word to the Commander. My Shado-Pan will be shortly behind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Loon Mai at Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Loon Mai at Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: I see.$b$bWell, we gave it our all. It's time to evacuate, save lives, and reassess our strategy, before these mantid take over the entire valley.
